item.title: Graphic Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are a marketing agency specializing in real estate development projects, seeking a talented Graphic Content Creator to join our team. Your role will involve creating compelling visual content for social media posts, advertisements, and other marketing materials.
*Payment: we can pay between 500-1000 euro / month (Based on the requested amount of materials 20-30/month and the quality of delivery)
Below are some examples of the style and quality we are aiming for:
• Quartier Azuga
• Quartier du Nord Residence
• Vulcan Residence
-Pinteres Board Example: https://pin.it/2Zjrq4Je2
**Responsibilities:**
1. **Content Creation:**
   - Design high-quality static images and reels.
   - Use Canva for text edits and adjustments.
   - Utilize raw materials from provided drive files, including images and videos.

2. **Template Development:**
   - Create and present 3-10 initial templates.
   - We do not need original stuff or etc, we just need someone to search for nice templates on the internet, and adapt them to our needs or inspire from them.
   - Adapt templates based on feedback to align with client needs.

3. **Client Collaboration:**
   - Submit completed materials for client review and make necessary modifications.
   - Ensure timely delivery of content, with deadlines ranging from 1 to 7 days.

4. **Content Strategy:**
   - Follow detailed briefs for specific campaigns (e.g., promoting penthouses, special offers).
   - Generate 5-8 posts monthly using creativity without detailed briefings.

5. **Content Segmentation:**
   - Differentiate between content for social media posts and ads:
     - **Posts:** Eye-catching visuals to engage potential buyers and showcase the lifestyle offered.
     - **Ads:** Retargeting and convincing potential clients to request quotes or offers.

**Requirements:**
- Proficiency in graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva).
- Experience in creating content for real estate or similar industries.
- Strong portfolio demonstrating creativity and high-quality designs.
- Ability to work with feedback and meet tight deadlines.
- Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.

**Monthly Workload:**
- Creation of 8-35 materials, plus occasional urgent requests (e.g., stands, banners, flyers).

**Additional Information:**
- Access to Canva for easy text edits.
- Drive files with raw materials will be provided.
- Initial templates required for feedback to streamline the process.
- Regular content will go under client review and may need revisions based on their feedback.

This brief outlines the scope and expectations for the Graphic Content Creator role, ensuring clarity for potential candidates and efficient collaboration with our team.


Budget: $800
Posted On: June 25, 2024 08:16 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Imagery, Infographic, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Imagery, Infographic, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Social Media Marketing
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor on Cybercrime Stories - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for an editor who is able to create documentaries on cybercrime.

We have 2 scripts ready to go, each edit to be at $250/video.

Here is a reference video:
https://youtu.be/_DSqv3C5S08

You must be able to:
- source high quality clips and interviews related to the story
- work with a given script and voiceover
- attention to detail in selecting clips that best suit the part of the script
- weave in interviews and soundbites to enhance the story
- create simple graphics similar to the reference video.
- edit music properly to create a flow

If you have read through the post, please indicate your favourite animated video/ad/film. (we will ignore anyone who does not include this)

NOTE:
- No agencies.
- We go by a project cost instead of hourly cost.
- Please indicate if you have a revision limit.
- Please also include in your post if there's anything else you need to inform us (e.g. commitments, work time, etc.)

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor / Animator for Fantassy / Worldbuilding YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there,

I'm running a YouTube channel called Weltengeist for a while now. (https://youtube.com/c/weltengeist)

Due to the absence of our video-edtior I wasn't able to produce more content, yet I want to. We need someone who can get the maximum out of our drawings. We will provide you with all assets that you need.

As videos have different duration and complexity I am open to discuss budget all the time, yet as this is only a creative hobby and I am alone not earning money with this I'm aiming for round 100-150$ p. Video.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Video edit - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a skilled video editor with experience in creating content for Instagram Reels and TikTok Reels? We are seeking someone to edit our videos, utilizing the content we provide. The edited videos must be compatible with both platforms and include captions, our logo at the end, background music, and before and after images to enhance the visual impact. The video duration is only 12 seconds, making it a quick and engaging watch. If you have the expertise to bring our vision to life, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and let's create compelling videos together! There will be approx 10 videos per month

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Music Video

item.title: YouTube Video Editors for Crypto Startup - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there, creative minds! We're on the lookout for talented video editors to join our team and help us craft amazing YouTube content on a regular basis. With storyboards and style guidelines already in place, you'll have everything you need to get started.

What We're Looking For:

Proven experience in editing YouTube videos
Ability to follow a storyboard and adhere to our style
Reliability and punctuality
Creativity and a keen eye for detail
Payment:

Videos up to 5 minutes: $100
Videos 5-10 minutes: $120 - $180
What We Offer:

Steady stream of projects
Clear guidelines and support
Fair and prompt payment
The first video should match the style of this example: Check it out here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ydkvO6C9pTs&t=3s

Before we commit, we'd like to see a first cut. This will help us decide if we're a good fit.
Text me :-) I will give you the whole brief.

Interested? Send us your portfolio and a brief intro showcasing your best work. We can't wait to see what you've got!



Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, English
Skills: Video Editing, English
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Shorts - Video Podcast Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I recorded single video podcast episode which I need editing into short form clips for social.

Picture attached - we filmed it on 3x cameras.
Great audio.

Now... I'm looking for someone who really level-up the production.

- Cool use of movie B-Roll (where appropriate)
- Zoom / transition effects
- Sound Fx (without doing too much)
- Subtitles

I've seen the promo clips for Diary of a CEO video podcast.
Those are really impressive.

TO APPLY: Please share examples of your best work in this field.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing

item.title: Bilingual Content Creator & Influencer – Spanish - Upwork
item.description:
Key Responsibilities:

Content Creation: Produce high-quality, engaging videos in Spanish that replicate the style and success of selected viral English TikTok videos.
Brand Representation: Act as a brand ambassador, embodying our values and aesthetics in every piece of content.
Audience Engagement: Interact with followers through comments and direct messages, building a loyal community around the brand.
Performance Monitoring: Track and report on video performance using TikTok analytics, using insights to optimize future content.
Collaboration: Work closely with our marketing team to align content with broader promotional campaigns and objectives.
Required Skills and Qualifications:

Fluency in Spanish and English: Must speak, read, and write fluently.
Videography and Editing Skills: Proficient with video recording equipment and editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
On-Camera Presence: Strong, engaging on-camera presence with the ability to convey enthusiasm and authenticity.
Understanding of Social Media Trends: Keen awareness of current trends on TikTok and other social media platforms.
Self-motivated: Ability to work independently and produce content consistently under deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in Influencer Marketing: Prior experience in a role involving content creation or influencer marketing, particularly in e-commerce.
Cultural Sensitivity: Ability to adapt content to resonate culturally with a Spanish-speaking audience.
Analytics Skills: Comfortable using analytics tools to monitor content performance and make data-driven decisions.

I am looking for a hungry, attractive person ready to make a lot of money.

I am open to $ negotiations; I want this to work long-term, with a lot of potential money on the table.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:26 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Advertising, Sales & Marketing, Fashion & Beauty, TikTok, Product Listing Ad, Media & Entertainment, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, English, Spanish
Skills: Video Advertising, Sales & Marketing, Fashion & Beauty, TikTok, Product Listing Ad, Media & Entertainment, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, English, Spanish
Country: United States
click to apply
